description:
Leading a powerhouse Moroccan pop quartet, LALA blends keys, percussion, and
traditional instruments into a sound both timeless and boundary-breaking. Her
rhythmic intuition--honed through heritage and heart--transforms concerts into
communal celebrations where strangers dance and mountains echo back in reply.
name: Lala Tamar

performer.description: LALA TAMAR is an electrifying force on the global stage—a vocalist, dancer, and gimbrist whose performances bridge cultures and generations. With roots in Morocco and Brazil, she channels deep North African grooves and feminine power into a bold, contemporary sound. Her music is a rich fusion of ancient traditions and modern pop, steeped in gnawa trance, the rhythms of the Atlas Mountains, and her grandmother’s songs, reborn through electric bass, qarqaba, and synth.
performer.name: Lala Tamar

description:
With Shivahari Ranade on keys, Ashish Ragwani on tabla, and Hem Patel on
drums, Chintan Katti's compositions evolve into a vibrant tapestry of rhythm
and melody. Fueled by their creative synergy, the ensemble leads audiences on
a compelling musical journey--ranging from quiet introspection to joyful,
high-energy moments.
name: Chintan Katti - Urja Live!

performer.description: Urja is a vibrant and genre-defying ensemble that reimagines Indian classical music through a modern lens. Led by sitarist and composer Chintan Katti, the group blends the meditative depth of traditional ragas with the energy and texture of contemporary soundscapes—creating performances that are both emotionally resonant and engaging.
performer.name: Chintan Katti - Urja Live!

description:
At the heart of this collaboration lies a deep exploration: how the violin and
nagaswaram--melodic instruments from divergent lineages--converse, contrast,
and complement one another. Alongside, the rhythmic dialogue between mridangam
and thavil unfolds with equal intrigue and intensity.  
  
Crafted with careful attention to the sonic and musical identities of each
instrument, every performance is a journey--blending composition with
improvisation, structure with spontaneity. It is not merely a fusion, but a
celebration of what emerges when boundaries are set aside and traditions meet
in free-flowing expression.
name: A Carnatic Quartet

performer.description: Curated by violinist Shreya Devnath, this Quartet is a unique confluence of four masterful artistes and two powerful instrumental pairings—each rooted in distinct cultural traditions within the Carnatic idiom.
performer.name: A Carnatic Quartet
